attributes.action: Scrap the plan to tax householders more if they improve their homes or live in a so called desirable area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposal imposes a large number of non value added jobs in the burgeoning public sector and is an invasion of privacy. Furthermore it is patently unfair to the people who are working hard to support the family and reduce the environmental impact of their lifestyles.
